content_description:
LocalBar, hottest new spot for great pub food, drinks and live entertainment, is celebrating its grand opening with a giant rocking block party featuring top notch musical entertainment, bites and complimentary cocktails.

The evening kicks off with a set from legendary DJ â€” who blend electronic elements and turntables with Latin, funk, hip hop and dub to create a sound all of his own. Later on that evening legendary DJ, in a special appearance, will offer their rollicking brand of soulful blues.
